dct_description_sm: drawn by J.M.W. Turner from a sketch by C. Barry ; engraved by W. Finden.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Illustrations of people and animals in the foreground.
Shows topography, vegetation, structures, places of historical interest.
"Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the gentiles. Luke, XXI - 24."
Appears in Turner's illustrations to the Bible.
dct_creator_sm: Turner, J. M. W. (Joseph Mallord William), 1775-1851
